data.title: YES, ALL MEN!
data.meta_description: Listen to YES, ALL MEN! on Spotify. Welcome to the "Yes, All Men!" podcast brought to you by VESTA  Since starting work in the sexual violence prevention field, Ilyas has embarked on a journey of learning about hegemonic masculinity and examining what it truly means to be a man. Through his perspective as a straight, mixed race man, he will be exploring why all men need to be a part of sexual violence prevention. Through his conversations with other men, women, and relevant scholars, Ilyas also hopes to find a more positive version of masculinity.  Intro and outro music by artist SRE.
